testcase.name: US01 Login page must be accessible and user can enter datas validly or unvalidly
testcase.system-out: Given Environment must be accesable.........................................passed And Invalid username invalid password should not acces......................passed And Valid username invalid password should not acces........................passed And inValid username valid password should not acces........................passed Then Valid username valid password should acces succesfully.................passed

testcase.name: US02 Main Menu and subtitles must be executable

testcase.name: US03 Hotel must be created

testcase.name: US04 Hotel Rooms must be created
testcase.system-out: Given Check that the Hotel Rooms link works.................................passed And Check that the Add Hotelroom button works...............................passed And When all the information is entered and the save button is pressed, the message has been saved successfully..passed Then When the information to be entered is not entered, it is seen that it does not register when the save button is pressed..passed
